ComicInfo.Series: Here Come the Lovejoys Father Fixation
ComicInfo.Summary: Frank offers daughter Debbie anything she desires for her birthday. It turns out that her heart's desire is breast augmentation. Since she's only 18, Frank must go along for guidance and support. Meanwhile, wife Mildred receives a dying request from one of her many stepfathers that puts her in a curious bind - literally! Stepdaughter Jenny's search for her real father proves problematic. Will Jenny agree to stepdad Frank's unthinkable terms to solve her problem? And, if she does, will Frank help pay for her inevitabe therapy bills? Stay tuned!
